title: "Example: generate the mcmcEpi3 data set"

To generate the `mcmcEpi3` data set, we ran

```{r echo = FALSE, tidy = FALSE}
knitr::read_chunk(here::here("scripts", "snippets", "epi3-mcmc.r"))
```

```{r epi3_mcmc, eval = FALSE}
```

[Return](mcmc_diagnostics.html#summary-statistics) to the MCMC diagnostics session.
